short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discu is a chrome extension for automating repetitive conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save answers to repetitive questions and access them instantly!

Without having to memorize anything: neither answers, nor where you put them. Not even elaborate shortcuts for every single one of them - the question you're answering is your new shortcut. Try it and see for yourself.

Connect question with an answer and reuse it anywhere. Exactly how you want to phrase, without correcting after buggy text generators with weird tone.

Accessible with mouse and keyboard shortcuts.
